attributes.action: Investigate council housing, the members of councils who are responsible.
attributes.additional_details: This is because I believe this issue impacts myself and many people in my local council and after loads of primary research I have come to the conclusion that it affects other members of the public across the nation
attributes.background:
Regulate council housing 
Investigating whether council housing meets standards and criteria
Check whether work is being done by the council members

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about council housing, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

There is already extensive regulation relating to the provision of social housing. You can find out about how social housing is regulated here: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/regulator-of-social-housing/about

If you are concerned about the provision of social housing in your area you could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
